hub_contract.description: Address of the staking hub contract

reward_denom.description: Denom of the staking reward token

satlayer_fee_addr.description: Address to receive the fee from the rewards

satlayer_fee_rate.description: Rate at which fee is taken from rewards

Decimal.description:
A fixed-point decimal value with 18 fractional digits, i.e. Decimal(1_000_000_000_000_000_000) == 1.0

The greatest possible value that can be represented is 340282366920938463463.374607431768211455 (which is (2^128 - 1) / 10^18)
